newsitem.title: UNITED NATIONS: Russia UN envoy - can't accept UK Iraq resolution.
newsitem.headline: Russia UN envoy - can't accept UK Iraq resolution.

text.p: Russian ambassador to the United Nations, Sergei Lavrov, said on Wednesday that his country could not support a Security Council resolution drafted by the British delegation which would condemn Iraq's incursion into protected Kurdish regions in north of the country.
"We cannot support the latest version of the British draft," Lavrov said.

"We do believe that the concept in the U.K. draft ignores the origin of the crisis. It ignores that it started with the Kurdish groups fighting each other," he said. "The situation isn't black and white as presented in the British draft."
